I am...

An ambitious web developer and programmer

I believe...

That flexibility, adaptability, and growth, ought to be characteristics common to humans and systems

That elegant code yields elegant results

That the team's love for its work is reflected on the product

That problem is another word for creativity outlet

My Services

Software Development

I develop, review, and maintain software code for Linux, Windows, and Android mobile applications in Java and C++

Web Development

I design and develop responsive and interactive websites for corporations and private businesses with CSS and JavaScript

Network Administration

I configure and administrate LANs and intranets with Cisco systems for corporations for optimal performance
